entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
